Name: IcyFlame
AboutMe:
I am a second year undergraduate student, studying Mechanical Engineering at IIT Kharagpur, West Bengal, India.

I know a good amount of coding in Python, C, C++, JavaScript.

I have recently started learning Scheme. And am still getting used to the list processing domain, prefix expressions and functional programming.

I started coding in 2011 and since then, I have fallen in love with it!!

I started out with C++, as do most, and worked with it for some time.

After that I discovered python and there was no returning back from there. I have created some applications in Python, using Tkinter for GUI.

I have worked extensively in both front-end web developmentand back-end development. Back-end fascinated me a lot more, and am still learning a lot about the MVC paradigm.

I use Tkinter for creating the GUI of most of the applications that I write in Python.

I also play the keyboard and I love all the compositions by Yanni

I solve the Rubik's Cube. And my average time for solving the cube, is under 50 seconds.

Some of my favourite quotations are:

DUBITO ERGO COGITO,COGITO ERGO SUM

I DOUBT THEREFORE I THINK, I THINK THEREFORE I AM

--RENE DESCARTES
